description.full:
ZUIX, Javascript library for component-based development.
       https://genielabs.github.io/zuix
description.summary:
ZUIX, Javascript library for component-based development.
       https://genielabs.github.io/zuix

tags.string: {Object|undefined} contextId The context id. HTML attribute equivalent: `data-ui-context`.
tags.name: contextId
tags.description: The context id. HTML attribute equivalent: `data-ui-context`.

tags.string: {JSON|undefined} model The data model.  HTML attribute equivalent: `data-bind-model`.
tags.name: model
tags.description: The data model. HTML attribute equivalent: `data-bind-model`.

tags.string: {Element|undefined} view The view element. HTML attribute equivalent: `data-ui-view`.
tags.name: view
tags.description: The view element. HTML attribute equivalent: `data-ui-view`.

tags.string: {boolean|undefined} html Enable or disable HTML auto-loading (**default:** true).
tags.name: html
tags.description: Enable or disable HTML auto-loading (**default:** true).

tags.string: {ContextReadyCallback|undefined} ready The ready callback, called once the component is succesfully loaded.
tags.name: ready
tags.description: The ready callback, called once the component is succesfully loaded.

tags.string: {ContextErrorCallback|undefined} error The error callback, called when error occurs.
tags.name: error
tags.description: The error callback, called when error occurs.
